column3: Counsel for  the  Appellant moves  to  withdraw  the  appeal against both

column1: convictions.  Accordingly,  convictions  with  regard  to  1 st  and  2 nd  charges  are

column2: affirmed.  Thereafter,  the  counsel  makes  submissions  to  the  effect  that the
sentence  imposed  with  regard  to  the  2 nd  charge is  illegal  and  accordingly it
has to  be one  half of the  maximum  prescribed  sentence  in  terms of Section

column3: Sentences  of both  charges  to  run  concurrently  and  also  to

column2: implement  the  sentence  from  the  date  of conviction  and  sentence  namely,
01.08.2017.  Rest of the sentences will  remain unchanged.

column3: Registrar  is  directed  to  send  copies  of the  order  to  the  relevant  High

column2: Court ofVavunia and the Prison Authorities.

column6: JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
